#Part 1: Fun with functions
##Part 1A: Exponential transformation
```{r 1a, echo=TRUE}
Exp <- function(x, k) {
  sum=1
  while (k>=1){
    a <- x^(k)/factorial(k)
    k <- k-1
    sum = sum + a
  }
  print(sum)
  }
```
